yourFutureBoss.shortDescription: Unlock new career opportunities Oracle Fusion HCM Technical professionals are in high demand. Start your journey today!

sectionOne.title: Meet Your Trainer
sectionOne.shortDescription: Vijay is an Oracle-certified expert with over 16 years of experience in Oracle ERP and Cloud technologies. As an instructor for Oracle University and a certified trainer, he brings in-depth technical expertise specifically in Oracle Fusion HCM Technical and OIC (Oracle Integration Cloud). He has successfully conducted 35+ batches, mentored over 16,000 learners, and is renowned for his flexible and practical teaching style—whether it’s corporate, classroom, or online training.Vijay is an active contributor in the Oracle community, known for his guidance, mentorship, and staying ahead with evolving HCM technologies.

faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle Fusion HCM Technical Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle Fusion HCM Technical Training covers essential modules such as Fusion Technical Overview, BI Publisher (BIP) Reports, OTBI Reports, Web Services, Integrations, Inbound and Outbound Data Loading, HCM Data Loader (HDL), Spreadsheet Data Loader (SDL), and Master Data Creation. For a detailed breakdown, please refer to the course syllabus.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: The training sessions are conducted from Monday to Saturday, with each session lasting 1 hour per day. This ensures a structured and interactive learning experience throughout the Oracle Fusion HCM Technical Training.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, we do not offer weekend batches. All live sessions are scheduled Monday through Saturday for consistency and smooth learning progression.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide recorded sessions for self-paced learners. However, please note that live doubt clarification is not available in the self-paced mode of our Fusion HCM Technical Training.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, internships are offered based on your performance in mock evaluations. These opportunities help you gain hands-on experience with real-world Oracle Fusion Cloud HCM technical scenarios.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single HCM Technical Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, the Oracle Fusion HCM Technical Course is offered as a complete training package. Individual module enrollment is not available.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer end-to-end resume building support tailored to Oracle Fusion HCM Technical roles. Our experts help craft a job-ready resume highlighting your relevant skills and projects.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, a Laptop or Desktop is essential to access the Oracle Cloud instance and practice hands-on during the Oracle Fusion HCM Technical Online Training.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites for the Fusion HCM Technical Training?
faqs.answer: No prior technical experience is needed! This training starts from the basics. However, basic knowledge of HCM concepts or Oracle EBS is an added advantage. The course is suitable for graduates from any background, including B.Tech, PG, and other degree holders.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Our Fusion HCM Training begins with foundational topics and gradually advances to complex technical concepts, making it perfect for both beginners and experienced professionals.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer complete job placement support, including mock interviews, resume building, and career guidance. We are associated with top hiring partners like Evosys, Hitachi Vantara, NTT Data, LTI, FIS Global, AAIS, Tech Mahindra, and others.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Oracle Cloud HCM Certification Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we guide you through the Oracle Fusion Cloud HCM Certification process with sample dumps, preparation tips, and expert mentorship to help you succeed.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, all training session recordings are accessible through our portal. We also provide soft copy study materials for each module with screenshots and step-by-step navigation instructions.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Mock Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we supply module-specific interview questions and conduct mock interview sessions to help you prepare confidently for job interviews in Oracle Fusion HCM Technical roles.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, 6 months of Oracle Cloud instance access is provided for hands-on practice. No installation is required—practice is done through a secure cloud URL.

faqs.question: Can I Retake the Course?
faqs.answer: Yes, once enrolled, you receive a 1-year membership which allows you to attend multiple batches of our Oracle Fusion Technical Online Training.

faqs.question: Will I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, after successful completion of the course, you will receive an official Course Completion Certificate in Oracle Fusion HCM Technical Training.

faqs.question: Is Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No, this is a non-coding focused Oracle Fusion Technical Training. Basic technical understanding is helpful, but not mandatory.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer personalized one-on-one training upon request. Please note that pricing for one-on-one sessions differs from group training batches.
